entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Marshal.Copy throws SEHException on Arm64. #83626
  • Add tests for src generated IServiceCollection.Configure implementations #83621
    8.0.0
  • [JIT] Dead code might not be eliminated early enough #83620
  • [API Proposal]: Support binary format specifier 'b' and 'B' (standard numeric format strings) #83619
  • ARM64 - Investigate why a `mov` is inserted #83618
  • Static tests in abstract classes aren't running #83617
  • createdump is added to Mac app bundles #83613
  • [NativeAOT] Optionally compile unmanaged runtime at application build time #83611
    Future
  • Lock contention in LoggerFactory.CreateLogger #83609
    8.0.0
  • NativeAOT SetCreateObject on JsonTypeInfo<T> could be slimmed down #83608
  • Support all applicable ConfigurationBinder method overloads in binding generator #83600
    8.0.0
  • Decide whether to support TypeConverter usage in config binding source generator #83599
    8.0.0
  • Consider replacing custom config binding logic in console logging with use of binding source generator #83598
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add analyzer for Environment.SystemDirectory #83591
  • [mono][llvm] Unify *All and *Any SIMD intrinsics with mini implementations #83588
    Future
  • [mono] Add option for experimental SIMD support in JIT #83587
    8.0.0
  • [browser][icu] Enable custom ICU loading for Blazor #83585
  • ILLink reports duplicate warnings from properties in some cases #83581
  • [nodejs][ws] CancelTest.ConnectAsync_Cancel_ThrowsCancellationException unit test failure #83579
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'tree->IsCall() || tree->OperIs(GT_COMMA)' during 'Stress gtSplitTree' #83576
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\Directed\\debugging\\debuginfo\\tester\\tester.cmd #83575
  • can't load XmlSerializer lib on .Net 6.0 and .Net 7.0 #83572
  • Short time format is missing space under en_US on Fedora 38+ #83571
    8.0.0
  • System.Console.Clear() sometimes did not clear the console buffer. #83568
  • read mem.stat.hierarchical_memory_limit when looking for the memory limit #83563
    8.0.0

Closed

  • System.Net native crash in mono linux x64 #83481
  • Fix HostActivation additional probing path tests after moving to 3.0 SDK as part of Arcadification #3654
    Future
  • [Blazor WASM] System.InvalidProgramException: Unable to run method 'void Microsoft.AspNetCore.Razor.Language.Legacy.ParserHelpers:.cctor ()': locals size too big. #83260
    8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] BinSkim - EnableControlFlowGuard #83603
    8.0.0
  • [RyuJIT][arm64] Optimize "x<0" and "x>=0" #43440
    8.0.0
  • Blazor Wasm Debugging Crashes on Startup #83521
  • [API Proposal]: Adding ForEach method for IEnumerable<T> #83601
  • CreateFromEncryptedPem fails with valid PEM/KEY files #83594
  • Suboptimal codegen for memset/memcpy unrolling #83277
    8.0.0
  • .NET 7 breaking change in HttpClient timeout handling #82878
  • HttpResponseHeaders.Location can throw InvalidCastException #82943
  • System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.ChainTests.BuildInvalidSignatureTwice failure #82837
    8.0.0
  • Test failure:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.ChainTests.BuildInvalidSignatureTwice #57187
    Future
  • Http/Quic tests are crashing on Windows #83110
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve RA for LowerBlockStore #83627
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [JIT] experiment - Ignore PHI nodes for `IfConversion` phase #83625
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [WIP] Avoid clearing uncommitted mark array #83623
    area-GC-coreclr
  • JIT: stop copying EH tab info into inlinee compiler #83622
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix ToString handling of [Flags] enums with negative values #83616
  • Correct formatting of config binder generator #83614
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • JIT: revise inlinee block numbering, enable synthesis for inlinees #83610
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] Add a --experimental-jit-simd option to turn on the unfin… #83606
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Include args in hostfxr entry point tracing #83605
    area-Host
  • Introducing Time abstraction Part1 #83604
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] disable NTLM tests on RedHat.7 #83602
    area-System.Net
  • [draft][browser] JSObject thread affinity assertions #83596
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [browser] Escape sequence instead of unicode #83595
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Use Environment.SystemDirectory from GetFolderPath(System) on Windows #83593
  • Added floor and ceiling intrinsics for `System.Runtime.Intrinsics.Vector128` and `System.Numerics.Vector` #83592
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • JIT: Eliminate commas early in block morphing #83590
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ConvertIcuTimeFormatString: convert narrow no-break spaces to spaces too. #83589
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Globalization, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 8.0.0
  • Extend mstat format with information that maps to dependency nodes #83578
    NO-MERGE, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Fix encoding problem when publishing #83577
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [release/7.0] Ensure free buffer space when reading TLS messages #83574
    area-System.Net.Security, 7.0.x
  • Making mono_inst_name less misleading #83570
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • [LSRA TP]: Skip free heuristics if no free registers are available #83569
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Reverting: Set AssemblyName.ProcessorArchitecture for compatibility (#81101) #83565
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata

Merged

  • Bump webpack from 5.68.0 to 5.76.0 in /src/mono/sample/wasm/browser-webpack #83420
    arch-wasm, area-codeflow, javascript
  • [wasm] Various jiterpreter optimizations; implement CALL_HANDLER; don't abort for some icalls #83322
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Switch tests for --additionalprobingpath to mocked components #83541
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • [mono][interp] Correctly track livness of vars used with MINT_MOV_8_* #83597
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [Mono] Intrinsify max/min on ARM64 with mini JIT #83468
    area-Codegen-Intrinsics-mono
  • disable NTLM tests on RedHat.7 #83559
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Rename VirtualMethodTableManagedImplementation and add manual CCW to test generated RCW #83285
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [wasm] Fix dotnet.withRuntimeOptions #83586
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • JIT: profile synthesis blend and repair modes #83567
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] disable memorySnapshot for WS test #83583
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Use Environment.SystemDirectory to get system directory #83564
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Runtime lookup clean up, enable for helper-based tail calls #83430
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [tasks] Add auto runtime initialization template to LibraryBuilder #83050
    area-Build-mono
  • [node][ws] Active issue: CancelTest.ConnectAsync_Cancel_ThrowsCancellationException #83580
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [browser] fix advanced sample for MT #83582
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Slightly improve struct zeroing & copying #83488
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use nameof in attributes #83566
    area-Meta
  • [wasm] Implement rotate left/right immediate interp intrinsics in jiterpreter; implement clz/ctz/popcnt #83573
    area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Ensure free buffer space when reading TLS messages #83480
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [wasm] Post 3.1.30 emscripten bump feedback #83391
    8.0.0
  • Revert "ActiveIssue for BuildInvalidSignatureTwice on mono interpreter." #83542
    area-System.Security
  • [mono] Allow a single call when inlining methods #83548
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [release/7.0] Fix System.Management wminet_utils.dll lookup code for arm64 #83549
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Management, 7.0.5
  • [release/6.0] Fix System.Management wminet_utils.dll lookup code for arm64 #83546
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Management, 6.0.16
  • update msquic #83493
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Fix Wrong Date Format in Test Logs #83553
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0

Updated

  • Merge binary perf with big endian #83561
    area-Serialization
  • [browser] cleanup of early startup code #83411
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Print the state when the align instructions don't match up #83286
    NO-MERGE, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve and enable writing test wrappers to disk #83444
    test-enhancement
  • [android][ios] Add SDK and workload to support library mode #83487
    area-Build-mono
  • Convert JIT\Directed tests to merged test groups #83256
    test-enhancement
  • Unity managed runtime type name parsers #83484
    area-System.Reflection
  • [Mono] Intrinsify As* on ARM64 with mini JIT #83544
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Fixes #79187 Add MemoryMappedFile.CreateFromFile(SafeFileHandle) overload #83134
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Change `callvirt` into `calli` for virtual delegates #83461
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Optimize stackalloc zeroing via BLK #83255
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • update mariner Linux image to 2.0 #81973
    os-linux, area-System.Net.Quic, os-mariner
  • Initial changes for GetLocaleInfoString #81470
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Adding support for Vector512 `Equals`, `EqualsAny`, `op_Equality`, and `op_Inequality`. #83470
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update xarch to track more instruction metadata as flags #83473
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix reflection invoke file format issue for generic methods #83438
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Do not run embuilder minimal build #83475
    area-Build-mono
  • Add x86 intrinsics to improve CRC32 performance #83321
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Remove double quotes from OwnerCompositeExecutable #83552
    area-R2RDump-coreclr
  • [mono][aot] Load AOT module of a container assembly using assembly name #83511
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.0
  • Cleanup some HWIntrinsic logic to ensure the right gtType and simdSize are being set #83516
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Support exporting methods from referenced assemblies in a formal way #83396
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [System.Net] Introduce CIDR IPNetwork #82779
    area-System.Net
  • don't load MsQuic unless needed by HttpClient #83494
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • [tests] Retain OutDir for ioslike tests #82313
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [browser] Fix encoding problem when publishing with AOT #83510
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, wasm-aot-test
  • Fix BeginReceiveMessageFromV4BoundToSpecificV6_NotReceived #83463
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Arm64: Combine if conditions into compare chains #79283
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add new MemoryExtension.Replace(src, dst, ...) overload #83120
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono] Calling static virtual method in interface #83556
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Implement checking for Requires* on attributes for NativeAOT #83550
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Adding compare all/any intrinsics. #83515
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [test] Try to use nodejs instead of v8 #83524
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [eventpipe] Perform endian aware serialization of structs and arrays above FireETW layer #80493
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add LinkerFlavor to NativeAOT #83558
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Replace a load with cheaper mov instruction when possible #83458
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • use ROSpan in SslStreamCertificateContext #83485
    area-System.Net.Security
  • JIT: Prototype a generalized promotion pass #83388
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Initial step for adding AssemblyBuilder.Save implementation #83554
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • [release/7.0] Improve servicing docs for Microsoft.Windows.Compatibility #83557
    documentation, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.x
  • [wasm] Jiterpreter monitoring phase take 2 #83489
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
